title: Indigenous
common: List of families with at least one indigenous person:

value.name: Indigenous of Piratininga
value.desc: are people that lived in São Paulo - SP in the first years of the city, these people have Tibiriçá as their ancestor.

value.name: Indigenous of Ururay
value.desc: are people that lived near to Ururay and that would be/are descendants of Piqueroby.

value.name: Dias (Bahia)
value.desc: is an indigenous person reported by Pedro Taques (Moura, Américo, 1951, pp. 347) and Silva Leme (Silva Leme, Luiz G., 1904, Volume VII, pp. 03) as a Portuguese, but Priest Serafim Leite shows this is not possible (Projeto Compartilhar, "Pedro Dias").

value.name: Dias (Espírito Santo - Fundão)
value.desc: are indigenous people that appear in "devassa" of Jesuits in the 18th Century.

value.name: Rodrigues (São Vicente/São Paulo)
value.desc: after centuries being treated as a family with origin in Porto - PT, genetic sequencing allows us to correct map the family origins indigenous.
